readable.title: 3657016761_d553e514d9
readable.content: A child at a water park is sprayed from all sides by a ring of water . A child in a pink and black bathing suit walks through water mist from colored rings . A young girl stands under three large rings that shoot water in a water park . Colorful rings spraying water at little girl wearing swimsuit . The little girl in her bathing suit stands near the sprinkers and squeals .
